item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:

10. Ask HN: Share your AI prompt that stumps every model (301 points | 501 comments)
11. DeepMind releases Lyria 2 music generation model (241 points | 296 comments)
12. Avoiding Skill Atrophy in the Age of AI (87 points | 94 comments)

19. Fundamental flaws of SIMD ISAs (2021) (128 points | 98 comments)

22. Asymmetric Content Moderation in Search Markets: The Case of Adult Websites (81 points | 50 comments)
23. Petition to the Open Source Initiative: Publish the Full 2025 Election Results (21 points | 3 comments)
24. Show HN: I reverse engineered top websites to build an animated UI library (143 points | 89 comments)
25. Careless People (858 points | 445 comments)
26. Microsoft subtracts C/C++ extension from VS Code forks (183 points | 223 comments)
27. Observability 2.0 and the Database for It (100 points | 38 comments)
28. I Tried to Buy an Actual Barrel of Crude Oil (2015) (197 points | 109 comments)
29. Assignment 5: Cars and Key Fobs (2021) (207 points | 173 comments)
